content.html: The PSD2 European regulations forced banks to put APIs in place for various use cases, one of them being account information: the problem, only current accounts have been put in the scope (excluding savings for instance). So, limited interest for aggregators who scraped websites.
content.value: The PSD2 European regulations forced banks to put APIs in place for various use cases, one of them being account information: the problem, only current accounts have been put in the scope (excluding savings for instance). So, limited interest for aggregators who scraped websites.
